nodes.text: Tave was a Noghri male Je'daii Master who served the Je'daii Order on Tython at the height of the Infinite Empire's reign.

A Force-sensitive Noghri male, Tave was trained in the ways of the Force by the Je'daii Order on the planet Tython, one of nine planets in the Tython system which made up the Settled Worlds. Ascending to the rank of Je'daii Master, Tave was appointed as the assistant to Master Lha-Mi, the Je'daii Temple Master of the Great Temple of Martial Arts, Stav Kesh.
He trained many Je'Daii at the Temple, such as Sek'nos Rath, Tasha Ryo and Shae Koda. He instructed them in combat primarily, training them with staffs.
